org.libav.avdevice.bridge

Class AVDeviceLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.avdevice.bridge.AVDeviceLibrary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILibrary

    public final class AVDeviceLibrary
extends Object
implements ILibrary
    This class provides acces to the native avdevice library. The methods' documentation has been taken from the original Libav documentation.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

      • avdevice_version

        public int avdevice_version()
        Get version of the avdevice library. Bits 23 to 16 represents major version, bits 15 to 8 are for minor version and bits 7 to 0 are for micro version.
        Returns:
        version of the avdevice library

      • avdevice_register_all

        public void avdevice_register_all()
        Initialize libavdevice and register all the input and output devices.
